articles.description: The country group formerly known as Lady Antebellum video talked with singer Lady A after the band said it would use her stage name of over 20 years.
articles.content:
Country music reacts to "Lady Antebellum" changing its name to "Lady A" in the aftermath of anti-racism protests over the death of George Floyd.
